abstract: Lebanese police beat and arrest demonstrators protesting uncollected garbage in Beruit's streets; government inaction on promise to process trash sparks riots led by group called You Stink.
lead_paragraph: Lebanese police officers beat back protesters with clubs and sticks and arrested dozens on Wednesday in Beirut in the latest confrontations.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Lebanon: Trash Protests Turn Violent

snippet: Lebanese police officers beat back protesters with clubs and sticks and arrested dozens on Wednesday in Beirut in the latest confrontations.
